user_persona: A new user named Alex who wants to join the skill sharing platform.
user_goal: To successfully register for an account and log in.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Site
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage and sees the 'Sign Up' and 'Log In' tabs. He decides to create a new account.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Sign Up' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Registration fields including Email, Password, and Confirm Password appear.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Registration Details
narrative_steps.description: Alex fills out his email and creates a strong password, confirming it correctly before submitting.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid email, password, and confirm password. Click the Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System registers Alex's account and redirects him to the login form with a success message.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Account
narrative_steps.description: Now registered, Alex enters his credentials to access his new profile dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Switch to 'Log In' tab. Enter email and password. Click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is redirected to his profile dashboard after successful authentication.

user_persona: Jamie, a recently registered user wanting to personalize her profile.
user_goal: To create and save a complete user profile with personal information.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile Editor
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Jamie navigates to her profile editing page to add details about herself.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the profile editor page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profile editor form with fields like Full Name, Bio, Location, and Avatar Upload appears.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Avatar Image
narrative_steps.description: Jamie drags and drops a photo from her computer into the avatar area to set her profile picture.
narrative_steps.action: Drag and drop an image file onto the avatar upload zone.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Image preview updates instantly, showing the selected avatar ready for saving.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updated Profile Information
narrative_steps.description: Jamie completes all fields and saves her changes to make them live on her public profile.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out remaining fields. Click the Save button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are saved successfully; updated profile information displays in the preview section.

requirement_tested: Ability to add, edit, and remove skills and certifications
user_persona: Taylor, a professional looking to showcase his qualifications.
user_goal: To manage his list of skills and certifications effectively.

narrative_steps.title: Adding New Skill
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks to add a new programming language he just learned to his profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Add New Skill' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal form opens where Taylor can enter skill name and select proficiency level.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Existing Certification
narrative_steps.description: Taylor notices a typo in one of his certifications and chooses to correct it.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the certification item to reveal the Edit icon. Click the Edit icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The same modal pre-filled with existing data appears for modification.

narrative_steps.title: Removing Outdated Entry
narrative_steps.description: Seeing an old skill that’s no longer relevant, Taylor deletes it permanently.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the outdated skill and click the Delete icon. Confirm deletion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Skill disappears immediately from the list without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: Search functionality to find users by skills and certifications
user_persona: Morgan, a recruiter seeking candidates with specific qualifications.
user_goal: To locate users proficient in JavaScript and holding AWS certification.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Morgan types 'JavaScript' into the main search bar at the top of the site.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'JavaScript' in the search field. Press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results begin populating with users who have listed JavaScript as a skill.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: To narrow down further, Morgan applies an additional filter for AWS Certified professionals.
narrative_steps.action: Open the Certifications filter dropdown and select 'AWS Certified'. Click Apply.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results update dynamically to show only those matching both criteria.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Detailed Profiles
narrative_steps.description: Interested in one candidate, Morgan clicks their profile card to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a user profile card from the filtered results.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed profile view showing full skill and certification listings.

user_persona: Riley, a curious community member exploring the platform.
user_goal: To browse through various user profiles efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Browsing Session
narrative_steps.description: Riley lands on the Browse page to see what kind of talent exists on the platform.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the Browse Users page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Grid layout of user profile cards loads with avatars, names, locations, and key skills displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting Profiles
narrative_steps.description: Wishing to see most active members first, Riley sorts the profiles accordingly.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Recently Active' from the sort options above the grid.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profiles re-sort automatically to reflect activity timelines.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Pages
narrative_steps.description: As Riley scrolls, new profiles keep loading seamlessly due to infinite scrolling.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down continuously until reaching the end of current page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New batches of user profiles load automatically without manual pagination clicks.

requirement_tested: Detailed profile view showing skills and certifications
user_persona: Jordan, interested in connecting with a potential mentor.
user_goal: To review another user’s comprehensive profile thoroughly.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Full Profile View
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on a promising user card from the search results to see everything they offer.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a user profile card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed profile page with full bio, skills, and certifications listed.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Certification Links
narrative_steps.description: Seeing a verified certificate, Jordan clicks to validate its authenticity externally.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a linked certification entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Certificate URL opens in a new browser tab displaying official verification.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Contact
narrative_steps.description: Impressed, Jordan wants to reach out directly using the prominent contact button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Contact button located near the top right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Messaging modal opens allowing Jordan to compose a direct message to the user.

user_persona: Casey, a developer wanting to collaborate with peers.
user_goal: To initiate a conversation with another platform member.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Message Interface
narrative_steps.description: From a colleague's profile, Casey presses the contact button to start communicating.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Contact button on the user's profile page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Messaging modal overlay appears with previous messages (if any) and input box below.

narrative_steps.title: Sending First Message
narrative_steps.description: Casey writes a friendly introduction and hits send to introduce himself.
narrative_steps.action: Type a greeting message in the text area. Press Enter to send.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message appears in the thread instantly and gets sent to the recipient.

narrative_steps.title: Closing Chat Window
narrative_steps.description: Having said hello, Casey closes the chat window to return to browsing.
narrative_steps.action: Click the close (X) button on the modal header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chat modal disappears cleanly, returning focus to the original profile page.

requirement_tested: Frontend application fetching all data from backend APIs
user_persona: Developer Sam working locally during development.
user_goal: To verify that frontend retrieves dynamic data exclusively from backend services.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Environment
narrative_steps.description: Sam runs the unified development startup command to launch both frontend and backend servers.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend development server and backend API server start concurrently.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Data Flow
narrative_steps.description: Sam inspects network traffic while navigating to ensure no mock/static data is used.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser dev tools Network tab. Navigate to Browse Users page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: API calls to backend endpoints such as /api/users are observed fetching real-time data.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying JWT Authentication
narrative_steps.description: Sam logs in and confirms that subsequent API requests include proper authorization headers.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and monitor XHR requests in dev tools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Requests contain Authorization: Bearer <token> headers proving secure API access.

requirement_tested: Backend API connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: DevOps engineer Quinn setting up deployment environments.
user_goal: To ensure backend connects securely to PostgreSQL using provided configurations.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Quinn defines necessary environment variables exactly as instructed for database connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Set DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Environment variables are properly exported and accessible to backend processes.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: With variables configured, Quinn starts the backend service to establish database connections.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Service initializes successfully, connecting to PostgreSQL instance using configured settings.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Database Queries
narrative_steps.description: Quinn performs sample API requests to confirm database reads/writes function correctly.
narrative_steps.action: Make GET/POST requests to endpoints involving database operations.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Responses accurately reflect database contents, validating successful integration.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with npm run install:all for frontend and backend installation
user_persona: New contributor Devon joining the project team.
user_goal: To quickly get the entire project running locally with dependencies installed.

narrative_steps.title: Cloning Repository
narrative_steps.description: Devon clones the codebase to begin contributing and prepares to install dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Clone the repository and navigate to the root folder.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Local copy of source code is ready with package.json present at root level.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies Simultaneously
narrative_steps.description: Devon uses the convenience script to install packages for both frontend and backend parts.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend folders are installed sequentially without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Setup Completion
narrative_steps.description: Devon verifies that node_modules exist in both frontend and backend directories post-installation.
narrative_steps.action: Check existence of node_modules folders in frontend and backend subdirectories.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: node_modules folders found with required libraries populated in each.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with npm run dev to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: Team lead Parker guiding junior developers on efficient workflow setup.
user_goal: To streamline local development with a single command starting all services.

narrative_steps.title: Preparing Local Environment
narrative_steps.description: Parker ensures all prerequisites are met before launching the development environment.
narrative_steps.action: Verify dependencies are installed and database is reachable.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All prerequisites satisfied, including PostgreSQL service availability.

narrative_steps.title: Executing Unified Startup Command
narrative_steps.description: Parker demonstrates how to use the single command to boot up the full stack.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from the root of the repository.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend services start together in parallel, displaying console logs.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Running Services
narrative_steps.description: Parker checks that both interfaces respond appropriately once started.
narrative_steps.action: Access localhost ports serving frontend and backend APIs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend renders UI successfully and backend responds to health-check endpoints.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with cornsilk background color
user_persona: Designer Luna auditing visual consistency across device sizes.
user_goal: To confirm that the site maintains cornsilk background across responsive breakpoints.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Desktop Layout
narrative_steps.description: Luna opens the site on a wide-screen monitor and examines the overall background tone.
narrative_steps.action: Load homepage in desktop browser. Inspect body background style.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Entire background renders consistently in cornsilk (#FFF8DC) across all sections.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Tablet Viewport
narrative_steps.description: Resizing the browser simulates tablet screen size to check adaptive layout behaviors.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to simulate tablet resolution (~768px width).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts gracefully with columns collapsing but background remains cornsilk.

narrative_steps.title: Mobile Responsiveness Check
narrative_steps.description: On actual mobile device, Luna confirms readability and color fidelity under sunlight conditions.
narrative_steps.action: Open site on smartphone and scroll through major pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background stays uniform cornsilk with legible content and touch-target spacing maintained.

requirement_tested: Interactive elements styled with peru color
user_persona: UX researcher Kai evaluating usability cues and visual affordances.
user_goal: To ensure interactive components stand out visually using the designated peru theme.

narrative_steps.title: Evaluating Button Styling
narrative_steps.description: Kai focuses on primary action buttons throughout the app to assess color consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Locate several CTA buttons (e.g., Save, Submit, Contact) and inspect CSS properties.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons utilize peru (#CD853F) as either background or border color distinctly from static elements.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Link Visibility
narrative_steps.description: Links within paragraphs or navigation menus must also follow the brand's interactive palette.
narrative_steps.action: Scan for hyperlinks embedded in text or standalone navigation items.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Anchor tags inherit peru coloring with hover effects enhancing clickability.

narrative_steps.title: Assessing Hover Feedback
narrative_steps.description: Hovering over interactive elements should give clear visual feedback per design specs.
narrative_steps.action: Move cursor over buttons, links, and form controls repeatedly.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each interactive element transitions smoothly to a modified peru shade upon hover.

user_persona: First-time visitor Zoe exploring the platform intuitively.
user_goal: To easily understand how to navigate the site without assistance.

narrative_steps.title: Understanding Primary Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Zoe looks at the header to determine which sections are available for exploration.
narrative_steps.action: Examine top navigation bar items (Home, Browse, Search, Profile).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Menu items are clearly labeled and logically grouped for intuitive discovery.

narrative_steps.title: Using Dropdown Menus
narrative_steps.description: Hovering over certain items reveals submenu options offering deeper navigation paths.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a main menu item with sub-options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Submenu expands smoothly revealing secondary navigation choices beneath it.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing User-Specific Actions
narrative_steps.description: Upon logging in, Zoe finds quick access to her personalized tools via user dropdown.
narrative_steps.action: Click the user avatar/icon in the upper-right corner when logged in.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dropdown menu opens showing account-specific actions like My Profile, Settings, Logout.

requirement_tested: Data persistence for user profiles, skills, and certifications
user_persona: Tester Maya verifying long-term data integrity during usage cycles.
user_goal: To ensure that all edits and additions persist reliably beyond sessions.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Initial Data Set
narrative_steps.description: Maya adds multiple skills and a certification to her profile before logging out.
narrative_steps.action: Add three skills and one certification. Log out completely.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Skills and certification saved successfully; logout clears session tokens.

narrative_steps.title: Reloading After Break
narrative_steps.description: Returning later, Maya logs back in to see if previously entered data still exists.
narrative_steps.action: Re-login and visit own profile page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Previously added skills and certification remain intact and visible.

narrative_steps.title: Making Incremental Updates
narrative_steps.description: Maya updates some entries and removes others, checking that changes take effect immediately.
narrative_steps.action: Edit one skill and delete another. Refresh the page manually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Edits persist across refreshes and deletions are reflected permanently in the database.
